20110108060007.000|20110108060008.000|CC1|DOUGLASS CHILDREN.              
20110108060008.000|20110108060010.000|CC1|STEVEN HATCH WAS TRIED FIRST AT 
20110108060010.000|20110108060012.000|CC1|THE CANADIAN COUNTY COURTHOUSE. 
20110108060012.000|20110108060014.000|CC1|>> HATCH WAS A FOLLOWER, BUT    
20110108060014.000|20110108060015.000|CC1|HE'S THE ONE THAT PICKED OUT THE
20110108060015.000|20110108060016.000|CC1|HOUSE THAT NIGHT.

20110108060021.000|20110108060023.000|CC1|THE ENERGY FOR THE SECOND CRIME.
20110108060023.000|20110108060024.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THE STATE OF   
20110108060024.000|20110108060026.000|CC1|OKLAHOMA LOOKED TO HAVE AN      
20110108060026.000|20110108060027.000|CC1|IRONCLAD CASE AGAINST HIM.

20110108060029.000|20110108060032.000|CC1|HARROWING STORIES OF THE        
20110108060032.000|20110108060033.000|CC1|EYEWITNESSES AND SURVIVORS,     
20110108060033.000|20110108060037.000|CC1|LESLIE AND BROOKS DOUGLASS.     
20110108060037.000|20110108060038.000|CC1|THEN THOSE CONFESSIONS.         
20110108060038.000|20110108060040.000|CC1|THE STATE ALSO HAD BALLISTIC    
20110108060040.000|20110108060041.000|CC1|EVIDENCE LINKING THEM TO THE    
20110108060041.000|20110108060043.000|CC1|MURDERS AND THE TESTIMONY OF    
20110108060043.000|20110108060044.000|CC1|GINGER KEEFE, THE TRAVELING     
20110108060044.000|20110108060046.000|CC1|COMPANION WHILE THEY WERE ON THE
20110108060046.000|20110108060047.000|CC1|RUN.                            
20110108060047.000|20110108060048.000|CC1|KEEFE, WHO WAS NEVER CHARGED    
20110108060048.000|20110108060050.000|CC1|WITH ANY CRIME, TESTIFIED THAT  
20110108060050.000|20110108060052.000|CC1|AKE AND HATCH TOLD HER ABOUT    
20110108060052.000|20110108060054.000|CC1|KILLING THE DOUGLASSES AND      
20110108060054.000|20110108060055.000|CC1|SHOOTING BROOKS AND LESLIE.     
20110108060055.000|20110108060058.000|CC1|>> WE HAD TWO SURVIVING         
20110108060058.000|20110108060058.000|CC1|WITNESSES.                      
20110108060058.000|20110108060100.000|CC1|WE WERE ABLE TO IDENTIFY WHO THE
20110108060100.000|20110108060101.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE.

20110108060102.000|20110108060102.000|CC1|IN.                             
20110108060102.000|20110108060104.000|CC1|WE SOMEWHAT KEPT IT SIMPLE.     
20110108060104.000|20110108060105.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SIMPLE?            
20110108060105.000|20110108060108.000|CC1|THE JUDGE HEARING THE CASE,     
20110108060108.000|20110108060108.000|CC1|MAYBE.                          
20110108060108.000|20110108060110.000|CC1|BUT CERTAINLY NOT FOR THOSE     
20110108060110.000|20110108060111.000|CC1|SURVIVING WITNESSES.

20110108060112.000|20110108060114.000|CC1|ONCE IN THE PRELIMINARY HEARING.
20110108060114.000|20110108060116.000|CC1|BUT BOTH HE AND HIS SISTER WOULD
20110108060116.000|20110108060119.000|CC1|HAVE TO RELIVE IT ALL FOR       
20110108060119.000|20110108060119.000|CC1|HATCH'S TRIAL.

20110108060121.000|20110108060122.000|CC1|APPEARED IN COURT FOR THE FIRST 
20110108060122.000|20110108060123.000|CC1|TIME SINCE THE SHOOTING THAT    
20110108060123.000|20110108060125.000|CC1|LEFT HER AND HER BROTHER

20110108060127.000|20110108060128.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOW DID THOSE TWO  
20110108060128.000|20110108060130.000|CC1|KIDS DO ON THE STAND?

20110108060135.000|20110108060137.000|CC1|>> WE TRIED THE CASE IN CHIEF IN
20110108060137.000|20110108060138.000|CC1|ONE DAY.

20110108060158.000|20110108060200.000|CC1|HIM UNDER HEAVY GUARD.

20110108060203.000|20110108060205.000|CC1|>> AKE WAS A MEAN PERSON.       
20110108060205.000|20110108060206.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SHERIFF LYNN       
20110108060206.000|20110108060207.000|CC1|STEADMAN TESTIFIED FOR TWO HOURS
20110108060207.000|20110108060210.000|CC1|ABOUT AKE'S THANKSGIVING        
20110108060210.000|20110108060210.000|CC1|CONFESSION.

20110108060212.000|20110108060213.000|CC1|LESLIE WERE THE STAR WITNESSES  
20110108060213.000|20110108060214.000|CC1|FOR THE PROSECUTION.

20110108060216.000|20110108060218.000|CC1|AKE AS THE MAN WHO SHOT THEM AND
20110108060218.000|20110108060220.000|CC1|MURDERED THEIR PARENTS.

20110108060226.000|20110108060226.000|CC1|TESTIMONY.
